attributes.action: To use Jerusalem as the English national anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the Prime minister to sanction the replacement of God save the Queen with Jerusalem as the national anthem of England. We feel that the Welsh and Scottish both have anthems for there own country and we do not feel that is correct for God save the Queen to be used by England as this anthem is for the United Kingdom as a whole.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
